== Motivation ==
It has become apparent over the last few months that the installation, configuration, and administration of Hyrax, both OLFS and BES, leaves much to be desired. It can be somewhat complicated without clear, easy to follow instructions. What can we do to fix this?
== Statement of Work ==
The work here can be broken down into two separate tasks, one short term and one longer term. # What can we do now to help people with installation, configuration, and administration # What are our long-term goals to make Hyrax easier to install, configure, and administer. Installation Interface (through browser, java, ???). Configuration interface (perhaps the same as Installation Interface). Administrative interface with administrative API for OLFS and BES.
